about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate about technology, Web Developer and Biomedical Engineering Student from Colombia. I am currently making personal projects in order to create awesome products.

skillsDescription.title: My Skills
skillsDescription.description: My main experience is front end development, where I build powerful, reactive and useful websites. I use HTML, CSS and JavaScript joint with AngularJS and Jquery. I also develop backend applications such as REST APIs built with NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB and more technologies.
